text:
Image:Ann Patchett 2012 Shankbone.JPG|thumb|Ann Patchett, 2012
Ann Patchett (2 December 1963) is an American author who writes literary fiction. She has written many novels, including "Run", "The Patron Saint of Liars" and "Taft". Patchett was born in Los Angeles, although she later moved to Nashville, Tennessee.
